LanguageData.ResearchPal.SLClickAddToQueue: Shift + Left-click to append to queue.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ALClickAddToQueue: Alt + Left-click to prepend to queue.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.RightClickIcon: Right-click item icon (or dots icon) to show detail information.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.Drag: Drag to interact with research queue.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShortcutManual: Press shift to display shortcut manual.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.TechLevelTooLow: Because your faction tech level is too low ({0}), research cost is multiplied by {1} (from {2}).
LanguageData.ResearchPal.BuildingResearchTreeAsync: Start building research tree on background
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShowNotificationPopupTip: Whenever you finish research, pause and show the default notification.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldSeparateByTechLevelsTi: Divide the tree up into tech levels. Turn this off for a denser layout.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldPauseOnOpenTip: Pause the game when the research tab is displayed.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShouldResetOnOpenTip: Clear filtering and reset scroll position.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AlignCloserToAncestorsTip: Heuristically put research nodes closer to their prerequisites instead of children.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.MinimumSeparateModTechTip: If a mod adds more than this number of research projects, they will be grouped together in the tree.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.PlaceSeparatelyTip: Place research projects together ignoring heuristics.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.SearchByDescriptionTip: Searches will match the keyword against descriptions of the researches (may worsen search performance).
LanguageData.ResearchPal.DelayLayoutGenerationTip: Generate layout at the first time the research tree is used, instead of when loading the game.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AsyncLoadingOnStartupTip: Generate layout in background when game loads.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ProgressTooltipTip: Display research progress in a tooltip for in-progress project.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.AlwaysDisplayProgressTip: Always display the rest of the points needed to complete a project.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShowQueueIndexOnQueueTip: Display index icons on researches in the research queue.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.DontIgnoreHiddenPrerequisite: Leave enabled for balanced gameplay. Being able to turning off this option is for existing save game compatibility.\n\nRestart the game to apply.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.NeedsRestart: Research settings changed, restart RimWorld to apply the change.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.SwapZoomModeTip: If enabled, shift+scroll wheel will vertical-scroll instead of zoom.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ScrollSpeedMultiplierTip: Control horizontal and vertical scrolling speed of the main research tree
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ZoomingSpeedMultiplierTip: Control the zooming sensitivity of the main research tree
LanguageData.ResearchPal.DraggingDisplayDelayTip: The delay in second a dragged research node in research tree display as dragged. (doesn't affect dragging nodes in queue and the actual trigger of dragging)
LanguageData.ResearchPal.VerboseLoggingTip: Produce verbose debug logs in dev mode messages.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ShowVanillaResearchFinishedM: This mod may send its own letter when research is finished, or the normal vanilla behavior may be used instead.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.MaxAllowedTechLvlTip: If you are using a mod that caps the research, and the cap is not working correctly, you can override it here manually.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.ReadOnlyModeTip: When enabled, the tech tree may only be viewed as a reference, but not as an interface to start projects. This mode is meant to be used with mods that remove player agency, such as Random Research.
LanguageData.ResearchPal.StorytellerDoesNotAllow: Storyteller does not allow this tech
LanguageData.ResearchPal.RimedievalDoesNotAllow: Rimedieval settings does not allow this tech
